author: News On February
title: Russian model Viktoria Viki Odintcova hangs from Dubai s Cayan Tower in Mavrin Studios Instagram photo shoot - Yahoo7
text:
Model hangs off 306m skyscraper in death defying photoshoot Yahoo7 News Share Share Russian model Viktoria Viki Odintcova hangs from Dubai s Cayan Tower in Mavrin Studios Instagram photo shoot - Yahoo7 Social media users appear less than impressed with a high flying Instagram model’s high risk photo shoot in the skies above Dubai. Close Russian model slammed for death-defying photoshoot UP NEXT VIDEO A Russian model has been slammed for her death-defying photoshoot on one of the world's tallest skyscrapers. Source: Mavrin Studios Russian model slammed for death-defying photoshoot Russian model Viktoria Odintcova stars in the death defying snaps which she her dangling perilously from a ledge on one of the world’s tallest buildings, with no safety gear in sight. The series of photos show the 23-year-old model suspended from the side of Dubai’s Cayan Tower, held aloft by nothing more than her, and a fellow model’s grip. The stunt appeared to rely entirely on the models' grip to avoid disaster. Photo: Mavrin Studios/Instagram The series of images show her leaning back from the ledge while another subject holds onto her hand. She is later shown from above with her entire body suspended off the side of the skyscraper. The shots divided opinion as users argued whether artistic merit trumped potential death. Photo: Mavrin Studios/Instagram Other shots show he crawling back over the ledge with the assistance of the man in the shots. While it is not immediately clear how far up the 306 metre tall tower, the images suggest Ms Odintcova is nearer the top than the bottom. Photo: Mavrin Studios/Instagram Even with the risk of falling now in her past, the model says the shots can still set her heart pounding. “I still cannot believe that I did it. Every time I watch this video, my palms get sweaty,” she told The Sun. Viktoria 'Viki' Odintcova leans backwards in one of the photos. Photo: Mavrin Studios/Instagram While the shots attracted plenty of praise from Ms Odintcova’s 3.1 million instagram followers, they also copped plenty of criticism. Many labeled the photoshoot a potentially deadly and irresponsible exercise, not worth the risk for mere pictures. Share Share Russian model Viktoria Viki Odintcova hangs from Dubai s Cayan Tower in Mavrin Studios Instagram photo shoot - Yahoo7
